genius.core.protocol

Class SimpleMediatorBasedProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.protocol.DefaultMultilateralProtocol
      • genius.core.protocol.MediatorProtocol
        • genius.core.protocol.SimpleMediatorBasedProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultilateralProtocol

    public class SimpleMediatorBasedProtocol
extends MediatorProtocol
    Basic implementation of a mediator based protocol.

    Protocol:

    1. Mediator proposes an OfferForVoting
    2. Agents VoteForOfferAcceptance to accept/reject
    3. Mediator sends parties a InformVotingResult
    This protocol takes the last InformVotingResult that contains a Vote.ACCEPT as the current agreement. If no such vote exists, it is assumed no agreement has been reached yet.
    Author:
    David Festen, Reyhan

      • getRoundStructure

        public Round getRoundStructure(java.util.List<NegotiationParty> parties,
                               Session session)
        Description copied from interface: MultilateralProtocol
        Get the structure of the current round. Each round, this method receives a list of all the NegotiationParty and the complete Session which can be used to diversify the round structure at some point during the session.
        Specified by:
        getRoundStructure in interface MultilateralProtocol
        Overrides:
        getRoundStructure in class DefaultMultilateralProtocol
        Parameters:
        parties - The parties currently participating
        session - The complete session history
        Returns:
        A list of possible actions

      • getActionListeners

        public java.util.Map<NegotiationParty,java.util.List<NegotiationParty>> getActionListeners(java.util.List<NegotiationParty> parties)
        Description copied from class: DefaultMultilateralProtocol
        Get a map of parties that are listening to each other's response
        Specified by:
        getActionListeners in interface MultilateralProtocol
        Overrides:
        getActionListeners in class DefaultMultilateralProtocol
        Parameters:
        parties - The parties involved in the current negotiation
        Returns:
        A map where the key is a NegotiationParty that is responding to a NegotiationParty.chooseAction(java.util.List) event, and the value is a list of NegotiationParty that are listening to that key party's response.

      • getCurrentAgreement

        public Bid getCurrentAgreement(Session session,
                               java.util.List<NegotiationParty> parties)
        Returns the last offer for voting as the current agreement.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentAgreement in interface MultilateralProtocol
        Overrides:
        getCurrentAgreement in class DefaultMultilateralProtocol
        Parameters:
        session - The complete session history up to this point
        parties - The parties involved in the current negotiation
        Returns:
        The current agreement (the bid from the last action from the mediator that was Vote.ACCEPT), or null if no agreement yet.
